backpacks.title: JanSport Big Student Backpack
backpacks.description: The JanSport Big Student Backpack is perfect for students who need plenty of room for their books and supplies. It features two large main compartments, a front utility pocket with organizer, and a side water bottle pocket.

backpacks.title: The North Face Jester Backpack
backpacks.description: The North Face Jester Backpack is a versatile backpack that's perfect for commuting, school, or travel. It features a large main compartment, a front pocket with organizer, and a padded laptop sleeve that fits most 15-inch laptops.

backpacks.title: Herschel Supply Co. Settlement Backpack
backpacks.description: The Herschel Supply Co. Settlement Backpack is a classic backpack with modern functionality. It features a spacious main compartment, a front pocket with key clip, and a 15-inch laptop sleeve.
